title: Age of Gym Members: Best Type of Graphical Display
question_text: Owners of a local gym wanted to know more about the distribution of the ages of individuals who are members of their gym.  Using a list of the gym's $483$ members, the owners recorded the age of each member.  They found that the youngest member was $15$ years old, and the oldest member was $82$ years old! Of the following, which would be the best way to display the distribution of ages?
